solution_line_template: Janina spends ${rent_cost}+${supplies_cost}=${<<{rent_cost}+{supplies_cost}={total_daily_expenses}>>}{total_daily_expenses} each day for her pancake stand.
She must sell ${total_daily_expenses}/${pancake_price}=<<{total_daily_expenses}/{pancake_price}={pancakes_needed}>>{pancakes_needed} pancakes each day to cover her expenses.
